entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:45 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peawanuck Airport 01:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -10.0°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -11.8°C
Wind: N 35 km/h gust 61 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 11.
